# CheckDiscreetTag

## MissingTag

<!-- Description, Properties, ... sections are auto-generated. -->
<!-- REPLACE ME AUTO-GENERATION -->

### Details

Discreets tags should always have at least one of the following:
- Discreet tag(s)
- dependencyId attribute.
